attributes.action: To not isolate a whole class year of children due to one positive covid test
attributes.additional_details: Because we want our children to thrive, to get an education, to not be afraid, to keep up routine and to stop mental health problems, let them be children and stop this obscenity
attributes.background: To stop isolating a whole year of students just because of one positive test it’s not fair on the children’s mental health and educational needs.
